attributes.action: Prevent the removal of Human Rights from our society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yes (t)errorism is a threat to national security, however, so is the removal of our fundemental Human Rights.

We formally request that the PM and government of this country PROTECT our Human Rights by ensuring they are NOT removed or reduced in any way.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
